CustomField.description: A 2-decimal numeric field for Quantity of a Service Delivery expressed in the Unit of Measurement in the Service. For example, 30 minutes of tutoring where the Unit of Measure is hours, Quantity is .50.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A 2-decimal numeric field for Quantity of a Service Delivery expressed in the Unit of Measurement in the Service. For example, 30 minutes of tutoring where the Unit of Measure is hours, Quantity is .50.
CustomField.label: Quantity
